name: Cardboard Dungeon
description:
You cut some pieces of cardboard and draw a monster:

The Dungeon comes to life!

Cardboard Dungeon is a difficult strategy based first-person Rogue like in a procedurally generated labyrinth to fight monsters drawn on cardboard pieces. Collect loot but escape the dungeon fast, before it fills with deadly black magic! Trade your weapons for stronger ones, drink potions to gain powerful abilities, and eat some cheese, but watch out for Bork!

[*]---------------------------------------------[*]

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move

Q, E to turn

Mouse to look around

Hold space to attack

1, 2, 3, 4 to use inventory item

inventory + left shift to drop item

Controller are supported

[*]---------------------------------------------[*]
